citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:13 pm on July 2,
2024. The facility address was vacant. Phone calls were made to the phone number on file, but the calls could not be
connected. Calls were also made on July 11 and July 22, and the same message was received. An attempted inspection
letter was sent on July 23rd. No response has been received. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and
records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement
action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:13 pm on July 2, 
2024. The facility address was vacant. Phone calls were made to the phone number on file, but the calls could not be 
connected. Calls were also made on July 11 and July 22, and the same message was received. An attempted inspection 
letter was sent on July 23rd. No response has been received. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and 
records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement 
action. 
 
 
End Section
